sense.def:
Z izrazom
rather
na vljuden način povemo, da je nekaj do določene mere tako, kot je.

seg.quote: I'm rather puzzled by this question.
He looked rather pathetic standing in the rain outside.
I rather think it was three hundred and fifty pounds.

sense.def:
Izraz
rather
uporabimo tudi takrat, ko želimo reči, da je nekaj tako, kot je, v preseneljivo veliki meri.

seg.quote: The company thought I did rather well.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
would rather do a particular thing
, bi tisto naredil raje kot kaj drugega.

seg.quote: ‘What was all that about?’—‘I'm sorry, I'd rather not say.’

sense.def:
Z izrazom
rather than
v stavku povežemo tisto, kar je storjeno, s tistim, kar ni.

seg.quote: I have used familiar English names rather than scientific Latin ones.

sense.def:
Izraz
rather
uvaja tudi popravek ali nasprotje pravkar rečenega.

seg.quote: This was no matter for congratulation, but rather a matter for vengeance.
